content: in october 2022 a notary at a company performed their duties for a couple who wished to proceed with a mutual consent divorce the couple reached an agreement on the division of assets debts and arrangements for their children they waived the right to maintenance and made provisions for inheritance gifts and parental authority they also agreed on expenses tax benefits and the registration of shared residence the agreement covers various provisions including costs and the effects of the divorce the general administration patrimonial documentation dismissed the obligation to register without any request from the parties the parties acknowledge the potential impact on maintenance and social benefits and confirm their identity they have the option to appoint another notary or seek legal counsel they have read and understood the deed which will be stored digitally and can be accessed online

metadata.marital_regime: issues relatively division of common properties
